application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Annual crown reduction and pruning of the trees at the front and rear of our property, as per the enclosed description.T1 - Silver Birch - The current dimensions are as follows Height - 6-7 metres - Spread - 1.5 to 1.8 metres in all directions The target dimensions are as follows Height - 6-7 metres - spread - 1.0 metres (ie. 2.0 metres across)T2 - Red Tree - Unfortunately large sections of this tree have now died and we believe it needs to be removed and replaced.T3 - Olive - The current dimensions are as follows Height - 4.5 metres - Spread (see compass points in sketch aboveWest - 1.2 metresSouth - 1.5 metresEast - 1.5 metresNorth - 0.75 metres The target dimensions are as follows Height - 3.5 - 4.0 metres - Spread - 1.0 metres (West, South, East)T4 - Silver Birch - The current dimensions are as follows; Height - 6 metres - Spread - 1.2 to 1.7 metresThe target dimensions are as follows; Height - 4 metres - Spread - 1.2 metres
